name: Funeral March: Bard 26 / Blackguard 4 / Pale Master 10
author: KailPendragon

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Here we have an undispellable, divine feated, 4 apr, crit/paralysis/stun/hold immune, annoying (taunt), lasting inspiration inspirer/curser who has no problem getting into melee and deal some dark punishment on her enemies. Trap skills are in for enhanced versatility. This specific class combo has been published only as a Str non divine feated build in the old ECB Guild. This gal is gonna be a great asset to any party and an enjoyable build to solo along her own whole career.





******************************




FUNERAL MARCH - BARD(26), BLACKGUARD(4), PALE MASTER(10)
Human, NE or CE alignment
PvM, playable 1-40



ABILITIES(ending)
STR: 16 (24)
DEX: 8
CON: 14
WIS: 8
INT: 14
CHA: 15 (20)



BASIC STATS
Hitpoints: 354
Skillpoints: 273

•Saves
Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 26/25/25 (32/31/31 with capped Cha)
Saving Throw bonuses: Spells: +8
Dark Blessing: +1 to all saves for every +1 enhancement to the Cha modifier

•Immunities
Pale Master immunities: stun, hold, paralyzation, critical hits

•AB
BAB: 26
AB: 37 (melee)
AB buffs: Bull's Strength (bard) +1/+2, GMW +5, War cry +2, Bard Song +2, Bull's Strength (BG) +1/+2 (combined with Bard's BS +2/+5)
AB effective buffs: Curse Song +6, Taunt +1/+6

•AC
AC (full plate and tower shield): 36
AC buffs: Cat's Grace +1/+2, Mage Armor +1(dodge)/+4(dodge/def/nat/armor), PfA +2 (def), Haste +4 (dodge), Bard Song +6 (dodge), Divine Shield +5 (dodge), Eagle's Splendor +1/+2 (dodge)
AC effective buffs: Curse Song +2

•Special Attacks
SA: +1d6
Use Poison
Smite Good: 1x/day, Cha mod added to AB, +4 damage vs good enemies only
Undead Graft: 3x/day touch attack, paralysis on hit , Fort save vs negative energy DC 19, duration 1d6+2 rounds
Deathless Master Touch: 3x/day touch attack, death on hit, Fort save DC 17

•Divine Feats
8 uses/day, duration 5 rounds (14 uses/day, duration 11 rounds with capped Cha)
Divine Might: +5 divine damage (+11 divine damage with capped Cha)
Divine Shield: +5 dodge AC (+11 dodge AC with capped Cha)

•Bard Song
26 uses/day, duration 100 rounds
Bard Song (lvl 26): +2 AB, +3 dmg, +3 Will, +2 Fort/Ref, +40 HPs, +6 AC, +15 skills
Curse Song (lvl 26): -2 AB, -3 dmg, -3 Will, -2 Fort/Ref, -40 HPs, -6 AC, -15 skills

•Spells
Spell Casting: Bard(6)
Spells known: 5/5/5/5/5/5/4
Spells/day: 4/6/5/5/5/5/4
SR: 26+1d20



SKILLS
Disable Trap 1(5), Discipline 42(49), Hide 5(4), Lore 0(28), Perform 43(58), Set Trap 15(14), Spellcraft 38(40), Taunt 43(58), Tumble 40(39), UMD 30(35)

******************************



Advantages
•Critical hits immunity (lvl 30); stun, hold, paralyzation immuntity (lvl 27)
•Lasting Inspiration (lvl 36)
•Bard Song lvl 21/Curse Song lvl 23 available without gear. Bard/Curse Song lvl 26 available with gear/buffs
•Decent AB given the buffing/debuffing capabilities
•4 APR
•Very Good AC
•Nice saves, especially vs spells
•Divine Might/Shield
•Full bard spellbook
•Undispellable (lvl 38)
•Craft wand
•UMD
•High Taunt skill
•Trap skills



Weaknesses
•Low HPs
•Late full bardic bloom (undispellability, full spellbook, lasting inspiration)
•Gear needed for full bard song power
•More skillpoints would be nice
•No Still Spell
•ASF in armor
•No KD/IKD
•No Improved Critical

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
I really like the way this build balances casting power and durations with the attack level. I do dearly miss my staple KD/IKD, but this is sturdy enough to stand there and take punishment while going about their business.

And have sneaked yet another Craft Wand feat into a build. Very evil! Will certainly give this one a go when I am in a particularly ornery mood to harass my playmates.
